name: com.projectdawn.impostor
description: The Impostor Graph is a tool that allows users to create custom impostors for real-time rendering of distant objects. It enables users to build a graph of nodes that output texture atlases, materials, meshes, or other custom data, providing complete control over the impostor building process.

samples.description: HDRP impostor  that uses HDRPTerrain assets.
URP impostor  that uses GameKit assets.
